name: Floverview
description:
A flexible yet easy to use toolkit for hybrid flows and content maps.


Floverview can be used for various needs such as high-level wireframing, or designing and communicating to your team information architecture or particular user scenarios.


It comes with these parts:


Pages which are containers for content blocks and function buttons


Content blocks for showing what the page contains, such as text areas, forms, charts and tables


Function buttons for showing what users can do on a page


Connectors for joining functions to other pages


Annotation elements such as comment bubbles and frames for grouping pages


Everything is with auto-layout!
